text.div:
CARIN RTPBC Billing Unit Value Set

This value set contains the quantity unit of measure to be used when requesting predetermination of benefits for prescription-related products

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://ncpdp.org/unit-of-measure
    CodeDisplay
    GMGramQuantity unit of measure for products billed as a number of grams
    MLMilliliterQuantity unit of measure for products billed as a number of milliliters
    EAEachQuantity unit of measure for products billed as individual items (e.g., tablets)

name: CarinRtbpcBillingUnitValueSet
